## **About Me:**

Hi everyone! My name is Cecelia Kaufmann and I am a rising senior at Macalester College, graduating in Spring of 2024. I have multiple interests within my major, but I also have experience with finance work on political campaigns and interest in using technology to create more accessible cities, specifically for people with disabilities.
